content: अभि(भी)ष्टि {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (<ab>Ved.</ab>) To be worshipped by offering sacrifices (<ls>Sāy.</ls> अभियष्टव्य); an assistant, a protector, one who is praised or worshipped as a protector, one who approaches to assist or attack, one who assails or overpowers an enemy, one who approaches in order to obtain, desiring, desire (these meanings are given by European scholars). --ष्टिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} Assistance, help, worshipping, praising; a sacrifice; a hymn; approaching to assist or approaching in general; access.
